snippet: Lawmakers who took part in the examination called on the authorities to merge overlapping and sometimes competing agencies....
abstract: French government committee probing two terrorist attacks in 2015, including Paris attacks, recommends nation's intelligence agencies be streamlined and combined; finds extensive failures in collection and study of information could have helped stopped attacks.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers who took part in the examination called on the authorities to merge overlapping and sometimes competing agencies.

headline.main: French Inquiry Urges Changes to Intelligence Services in Light of Failures
headline.print_headline: French Inquiry on Terror Urges Changes to Intelligence Agencies
